text.div:
Mapping from (not specified) to (not specified)

ACTIVE. Published on 2023-10-09 00:00:00+0000 by WHO (WHO: http://who.int).

Mapping to and from IMMZ.D4 Data Dictionary to other codesystems.


Group 1 Mapping from IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements to ICD-11

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
DE162 (Currently pregnant):(equivalent)QA41 (Pregnant state)
DE165 (Severely immunosuppressed):(equivalent)4B4Z (Diseases of the immune system)
DE166 (History of anaphylactic reactions):(equivalent)QC44.0 (Personal history of anaphylaxis)
DE167 (Severe allergic reactions):(equivalent)QC44.2 (Personal history of allergy to drugs, medicaments or biological substances)
DE168 (Symptomatic HIV infection):(equivalent)1C62.1 (HIV disease clinical stage 2 without mention of tuberculosis or malaria)

Group 2 Mapping from ICD-11 to IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
QA41 (Pregnant state):(equivalent)DE162 (Currently pregnant)
4B4Z (Diseases of the immune system):(equivalent)DE165 (Severely immunosuppressed)
QC44.0 (Personal history of anaphylaxis):(equivalent)DE166 (History of anaphylactic reactions)
QC44.2 (Personal history of allergy to drugs, medicaments or biological substances):(equivalent)DE167 (Severe allergic reactions)
1C62.1 (HIV disease clinical stage 2 without mention of tuberculosis or malaria):(equivalent)DE168 (Symptomatic HIV infection)

Group 3 Mapping from IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
DE162 (Currently pregnant):(equivalent)82810-3 (Pregnancy status)
DE165 (Severely immunosuppressed):(equivalent)96381-9 (Immune status)
DE168 (Symptomatic HIV infection):(equivalent)47244-9 (Symptom, diagnosis, or opportunistic infection related to HIV treatment)

Group 4 Mapping from Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC) to IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
82810-3 (Pregnancy status):(equivalent)DE162 (Currently pregnant)
96381-9 (Immune status):(equivalent)DE165 (Severely immunosuppressed)
47244-9 (Symptom, diagnosis, or opportunistic infection related to HIV treatment):(equivalent)DE168 (Symptomatic HIV infection)

Group 5 Mapping from IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements to SNOMED CT (all versions)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
DE162 (Currently pregnant):(equivalent)77386006 (Pregnancy)
DE165 (Severely immunosuppressed):(equivalent)370388006 (Patient immunocompromised)
DE166 (History of anaphylactic reactions):(equivalent)10839421000119100
DE167 (Severe allergic reactions):(equivalent)419076005 (Allergic reaction (disorder))
DE168 (Symptomatic HIV infection):(equivalent)86406008 (Human immunodeficiency virus infection)

Group 6 Mapping from SNOMED CT (all versions) to IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
77386006 (Pregnancy):(equivalent)DE162 (Currently pregnant)
370388006 (Patient immunocompromised):(equivalent)DE165 (Severely immunosuppressed)
10839421000119100:(equivalent)DE166 (History of anaphylactic reactions)
419076005 (Allergic reaction (disorder)):(equivalent)DE167 (Severe allergic reactions)
86406008 (Human immunodeficiency virus infection):(equivalent)DE168 (Symptomatic HIV infection)
